extendedInfo.description: The largest ski area in the worldâs official application!Les 3 VallÃ©es comprise the resorts of Courchevel, La Tania, MÃ©ribel, Brides-Les-Bains, Les Menuires â Saint Martin, Val Thorens and Orelle:The largest ski area in the world, linked together by ski runs and ski lifts, with 600 kms of interconnected slopes and 174 ski lifts.These 8 different resorts offer a vast array of accommodation, ranging from low cost options to prestigious 5 star ratings.To get the most out of the 3 VallÃ©es, find all the live ski area news on your iPhone!- Interactive piste map with live ski lift and ski run openings- Find your geolocation on the ski area- Webcams- Weather forecast- High altitude restaurants- First aid posts- Toilets

reviews.title: Good piste map, other features basic
reviews.comment: The offline piste map is handy. Whether lifts/pistes are open/closed is confusingly presented and I wasn\'t convinced that it was completely up-to-date. The weather observations/forecasts are rubbish. I didn\'t use the feature for tracking my friends as we weren\'t all going to incur data roaming costs - sounds like a nice idea though.
reviews.author: Rich Day

reviews.title: Promising but needs more work.
reviews.comment: The map is handy but it can\'t find my location whenever I try. The weather is useful. One big problem is that the app always crashes after reopening it after a while
reviews.author: Filip Poznanovic

reviews.title: Les 3 vall\303\251es
reviews.comment: A very promising app but failed to work on my android HTC Sensation XE. Initial screen appears but then nothing. When back at base with an internet connection most functions show and would appear to be working. Either it requires better user documentation or there are problems to be fixed.
reviews.author: Nigel Clark

reviews.title: Great app if it did work on Android
reviews.comment: Works fine on iPhone but not on Samsung Galaxy S3. Ski Area opens but always fails to connect to server for info on map e.g. open hours , locating restaurants or rest rooms etc.. Also my ski function shows speed and distance while in stand still and although measures speed on the move it does not count descends  or uphill in addition to many other bugs.  I wrote the developer with the above and they recommended that I check my interenet connection lol. It always works on iPhone using same network dudes.
reviews.author: Randy Tarboush

reviews.title: Only purpose - map
reviews.comment: The only use for this app is having a barely usable map (little better than the paper one). Force closing every few minutes. If you want some stats and tracking, use AlpineReplay! Works like a charm.
reviews.author: Mikus Upmalis

reviews.title: Huge size download
reviews.comment: Not sure why the HD map has to download 26 mb to my phone. For something that size I\'d expect it to go onto my SD card instead! A shame.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No gps
reviews.comment: Gps position failed to work, a friends iPhone version worked fine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps force closing on Galaxy S2
reviews.comment: App keeps crashing on Galaxy S2, losing all speed/distance data in My Ski section....extremely frustrating!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor iphone conversion
reviews.comment: It\'s a bad port of the iphone version. Buggy, and irritating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HD map - internal mem?
reviews.comment: Why have HD map downloading to internal memory when there is 20+Gb free on SD card...doh!
reviews.author: ug Hancock

reviews.title: Defeneatly useful, nothing special.
reviews.comment: You cannot save lift times to work off the internet, wish you could. Does not locate you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Me
reviews.comment: Sweet.
reviews.author: mark griffiths

reviews.title: Crash on galaxy s2
reviews.comment: Bad
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor App
reviews.comment: The app keeps crashing when playing about with the Map. It won\'t even download a HD version.  A very buggy app. Great idea though.
reviews.author: Luke Kemp

reviews.title: Poorly tested
reviews.comment: Half the features crash the app so only useful for ski map and restaurant list
reviews.author: Marc Walker

reviews.comment: M.E
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Interesting bits Simply DO NOT WORK!!
reviews.comment: The GPS Max Speed part of the app Simply Does Not Work. Spent a day flying round the 3 Vallees and was told that my Max speed had been 13kph!! I downloaded a different product called SATSKI and that told me that 64kph was the max. Shame the developer never reads any of the feedback on this App as it is clear that everyone has the same problem.  Nice idea. Rubbish execution and no follow up to problems.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea, needs improvement.
reviews.comment: I loved this app when I found it, but, sadly two of the most useful bits don\'t work. The GPS just doesn\'t work & and gives a speed of about half your actual speed.  Also the app\'s weather forecast said 60kph winds. They were 5 kph. And it kept crashing, losing all your data.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea, rude implementation :(
reviews.comment: Takes 26mb in phone memory for HD map and crashes on any object selection, if no internet connection active.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No good.
reviews.comment: Poor, does nothing useful- does not locate me (google maps finds my position fine) and then if I start measuring my stats, in 1 minute I\'ve done 1km and 3 runs, all whilst being sat still. Also crashes and requires data usage all the time for info- why not cache it after downloading once, as its expensive abroad.
reviews.author: A Google User
